unnormalised: New Delhi: A significant update to the national mathematics curriculum incorporates LaTeX as a standard notation for advanced subjects. The Ministry of Education announced the change, effective from the academic year 2025-2026. This decision aims to better prepare students for higher education and research in STEM fields.
normalised: New Delhi: A significant update to the national mathematics curriculum incorporates L-A-T-E-X as a standard notation for advanced subjects. The Ministry of Education announced the change, effective from the academic year two thousand twenty five two thousand twenty six. This decision aims to better prepare students for higher education and research in S-T-E-M fields.

unnormalised: The revised syllabus will introduce LaTeX syntax for complex equations and formulas, starting with Class 11 and 12 students. Example expressions include integrating calculus concepts such as $\int_{0}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}$ as well as formatting matrices like $\begin{bmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{bmatrix}$. Educational experts predict this change will enhance students’ problem-solving abilities.

Example expressions include integrating calculus concepts such as integral from zero to infinity of e to the power of negative x squared d x equals square root of pi divided by two as well as formatting matrices like begin bmatrix a and b over c and d end bmatrix. Educational experts predict this change will enhance students’ problem-solving abilities.
